title: A feast for vvormes Set forth in a poeme of the history of Ionah. By Fra. Quarles.
author: Quarles, Francis, 1592-1644.
publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston, for Richard Moore, and are to be sold at his shop in Saint Dunstans Church-yard, in Fleetstreet,
notes: "Pentelogia" has separate dated title page; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
